about_the_game:
Take charge of Sin Squad, the deadliest group of stealth assassins in the world - the team that takes out the trash when governments and the U.N. cannot.

PLAN LIKE A STRATEGIST

Stalk your preys, survey the environment and plan your next moves. You're outnumbered and outgunned, so you'd better make sure to know what you're doing.

HUNT LIKE A PREDATOR

Stealth your way through the streets, parks, warehouses, squares, bad neighborhoods, buildings, alleys, subway, labs and who knows what else while exploring this forsaken place. Use a huge variety of tools to silently fool enemies and carve your way forward with deadly creativity.

KILL LIKE ELITE ASSASSINS

Lead Wrath, Envy and their crew of elite stealth assassins, each with unique characteristics, in a fight against the odds: infiltrate a twisted and corrupt city that was overtaken by an unknown terror group in possession of a mysterious virus. Eliminate them - one by one - to find out what the hell happened there - and fix it.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game features exaggerated blood and encourages players to assassinate their enemies.

There are recurring graphic assassination animations with visible blood, as well as a varied set of assassination tools and visual representations.

Characters speak maturely and their lines may contain foul language.

short_description: Plan like a Strategist, Hunt like a Predator, Kill like an Assassin. Master 7 deadly assassins with unique abilities in the twisted world of Sin Squad: Stealth Assassins, a 3rd Person Stealth Assassination game. Use dozens of stealth tools to infiltrate a doomed city and set it free from the inside.
